title: Question about ranked
body: Just finished 10 placement matches and got Silver IV. Do I start to earn/lose LP now? It says I currently have 0 LP so technically I can't lose any. Can someone please explain what happens from now on :)

replies.body:
Well yes now you can start to win / lose LP. Being on 0 the only thing you can lose is your current rank. so get demoted from silver 4 to silver 5. From memory you usually get 3 - 5 games on 0LP before you get demoted unless your hidden MMR is very bad.

Hope that was helpful any other questions let me know =)
Oh, I see. That helped a lot, thanks!
